snippet.title: Gods Eater Burst - PSP - Teaser EU
snippet.description:
In a post-apocalyptic earth, join the God Eaters : the only humans gifted with the ability to wield the God Arc weapons and fight against huge mutant beasts known as Aragami. With more than twice the number of missions than in the original God Eater and exciting hunting parties with up to four players, Gods Eater Burst will hit Europe in 2011 on PSP™, packed with enhancements and improvement for your delight.

if you care for mankind, enroll with the God Eaters on http://www.facebook.com/GodEaterBurst or get more information on your local http://www.namcobandaigames.eu website
